attributes.action: stop the closure of our 2 primary schools in glasgow
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we are parents,carers,people in the commuinity of wyndford who are up in arms due to glasgow city councils descision to close our 2 schools wyndford and st gregorys primary schools We all strongly agree that the community would suffer greatly from the loss of the two great, sturdy local schools

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
